plot: Silja Line is a cruise line company established in 1957 that has ships cruising between Finland and Sweden. This film has been produced for Silja Lines' 50th anniversary to tell the interesting history of the company.
title: Bon Voyage!
plot_es: Silja Line is a cruise line company established in 1957 that has ships cruising between Finland and Sweden. This film has been produced for Silja Lines' 50th anniversary to tell the interesting history of the company.
